ValidationRule.description: Validates that the account Physical Zip/Postal Code is in 99999 or 99999-9999 format if Billing Country is USA or US.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ShippingCountry = "United States", ShippingCountry = "US"), NOT(REGEX( ShippingPostalCode , "\\d{5}(-\\d{4})?")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Zip code must be in 99999 or 99999-9999 format.
